mapper.insert: INSERT INTO nbbs(boardCode, idx, subject, content, ipAddr, originalFilename, saveFilename) VALUES(nbbs_seq.NEXTVAL, #{idx}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{ipAddr}, #{originalFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saveFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM nbbs n JOIN tb_user tu ON n.idx = tu.idx

SELECT boardCode, subject, content, ipAddr, hitCount, TO_CHAR(created, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI;SS') as created, saveFilename, originalFilename, tu.idx, tu.id, tu.name FROM nbbs n JOIN tb_user tu ON n.idx = tu.idx WHERE boardCode = #{boardCode}
